Description: Up for sale is my favorite guitar that I have enjoyed for years. I have just professionally set it up with D' addario XL strings ( $15.00 a set). I cleaned and dressed the fretboard with lemon oil, tightened tuners, set neck relief, string height, and intonations. It plays and sounds awesome. It has the flame maple plus top which is beatifull. Great playing guitar, was my favorite. I preferred it over a Gibson I had for years. I just don't play electric much anymore. It has always been kept in case and very well taken care of. I am selling to purchase a nice taylor acoustic guitar. Comes with a nice chromacast hard shell case made for a les paul. No buckle rash or chips on body, no fret wear. The original pickguard is included, I just preferred the "look" without it.It will be shipped in a UPS guitar box with insurance and tracking number provided.I have sold many guitars on here in the past with very satisfied buyers. Feel free to check my feedback, it speaks for itself.Sold "as is"-no returns. To many dishonest people.Dont worry at all, you will not be dissapointed!!I only ship to the lower 48 states It is offered on local Craigslist also, so may end early if sold locally.
Title: Epiphone Les Paul Standard Plus Top (2005) W/HSC - Tob. sunburst  Exc Condition!
ConditionDescription: Professionaly set up with Daddario XL strings. Beautiful guitar!
